Descrição Detalhada

Deve ser capaz de manipular os dados de usuário, seja no sentido de atualizá-los ou modificá-los de alguma forma.

Definição na linha 325 do arquivo ProfileUnit.py.

341  def editField(self, request, field, form):
342  user = request.session['user']
343  if field == "name":
344  fpw = form.cleaned_data['password'].value
345  if fpw != user['password']:
346  raise ValueError(lang.DICT['EXCEPTION_INV_PW_F'])
347  newdata = form.cleaned_data['newdata'].value
348  elif field == "password":
349  npw = form.cleaned_data['newdata'].value
350  rpw = form.cleaned_data['rp_newdata'].value
351  opw = form.cleaned_data['old_password'].value
352  if npw != rpw:
353  raise ValueError(lang.DICT['EXCEPTION_INV_PW_R'])
354  if opw != user['password']:
355  raise ValueError(lang.DICt['EXCEPTION_INV_PW_F'])
356  newdata = npw
357  elif field == "language":
358  newdata = form.cleaned_data['newdata']
359  elif field == "avatar":

361  with open(addr, "wb") as destination:
362  for chunk in request.FILES['newdata'].chunks():
363  destination.write(chunk)
364  else:
365  newdata = form.cleaned_data['newdata'].value
366 
367  try:
368  if user['type'] == 'Student' and field != 'avatar':

370  elif user['type'] == 'Professor' and field != 'avatar':
371  self.pers.update(user['name'], field, newdata, Professor)
372  except ValueError as exc:

374  else:

328  def refreshUser(self, request):
329  user = request.session['user']
330 
331  if user['type'] == 'Student':
332  db = Student
333  elif user['type'] == 'Professor':
334  db = Professor
335 
336  fs = self.pers.fetch(user['name'], db)
